item.description:
Sorry for the delay....I wanted to see what was coming out this weekend...The movie of the weekend is The Inside Man starring Denzel Washington and others. The time of the movie is 7:45pm. It is the first week of the movie so it might sell out. Get there at 7pm and meet at the first consession stand. if you think something should be different email me back. rsdragon@optonline.net

Ross
item.name: MEDFORD/BOSTON MOVIE GOERS FAN MEETUP GROUP Meetup
